name: GAUDETE
description:
Introducing GAUDETE, a short but sweet puzzle platformer about a curious mangosteen girl looking to bring life to some old ruins.

Will you be able to make it through the ruins? Find out in this one-of-a-kind experience!

Oh, and there's also 2 endings. Try to find the second one after you finish the normal route ;P

Put your speedrun times in the comments! :D

This game was made by Hazelpy (submitter), CosmicFroggo, SavestateCorrupted & Drazically in 11 days for the Black and White Game Jam. All "gray" in the game was done with alpha channels in the engine.
